name: Eiffel Mania
description:
A mobile game for Android. It is realised in one week in collaboration between french students and indians students

Welcome to the late 19th century Paris and become a human cannonball ! Your adventure of shopping in Eiffel Tower begin now !

Team member itch.io :

  • https://chronodream.itch.io/
  • http://namanmerchant.itch.io
  • http://prakhar.itch.io/
